WRITING.TITLE: Anno 1800: Bad ship movement and slower overall gameplay compared to the old Annos. Any thoughts about it?
WRITING.TEXT: So something off topic first: im a really big fan of anno since 1602. A lot of people have been complaining that there is no land combat. I don #8217;t really mind it, I think it wouldn #8217;t fit with the slow paced gameplay. With this said, it #8217;s even more important to have a fun experience with naval combat. So about the topic: do you guys think the naval combat is good? I found that the ships often go on weird routes and sometimes chase someone for a very long time in defensive mode. Or they (not that often) sail into an island and then go around it. What bothers me the most is that it takes literally ages for the ship to turn, especially against the wind, which I understand but this slow! I don #8217;t like doing war anymore cause there #8217;s no strategy involved anymore.once your in a fight against an Harbour your ship stays there cause of the slowness when under attack. And combined with the slow turning it #8217;s just about the firepower and sustain. Though I like the design with the wind. It feels really good to sail with the wind.. but for combat it hurts cause of the slow turning. This brings me to my last topic: anno 1800 feels slower than the previous games. I have a feeling everything takes a lot longer. Not only the ship movement but also the progress. All the productions take a long time after the farmers. For instance producing steel? I have to wait ages for some steel to build things and I can #8217;t afford to make even more companies cause of the huge worker amount and upkeep cost (I know it #8217;s faster with electricity but you don #8217;t get that early). I think it just feels very slow altogether. Which gives your more time for building things and decorating your city, but it also gives you less time when your being attacked and didn #8217;t prepare for it, you #8217;re doomed then. Any thoughts? Would appreciate it!

The game is supre. There are still a few bugs, especially with the ship movement. But they will get fixed. First pitch is already coming in the 25.04. Like everyone said if u like city building games, it #8217;s one of the best not only from the anno series.
Ships are full of bugs.. they should really focus inducing them before doings dlcs cause it kind of kills the fun in conquering etc. and ships are the only units in the game
Why would u want to buy it in epic store? It uses uplay anyway and I got one more Programm running in the background ;)
https://www.anno-union.com/en/category/union-update-en/

U should be fine with shipping it back to ur mai. Island. Just when shipping from the new world it #8217;s a bit harsh cause of the shiptraveltime. If u don #8217;t want to produce only on ur main island, u can also build workers on the second island very easily (just fishery and cloths). When u click on a residents house, u can click on the different needs/luxuries to stop them from having and using them. So for instance u are making bread on ur second island but don #8217;t want them to eat it, then just click on the bread in their overlay and they won #8217;t eat it (depending on how many needs u are crossing out they might get angry cause they don #8217;t have enough needs fulfilled, so just play around a bit, but I think crossing out 1 thing shouldn #8217;t be an issue)

Ah and another tip from me is, u can always easily produce enough for ur people with some workforce left at any given time, other wise it wouldn #8217;t be a balanced game. The thing is to not overproduce if ur workforce is almost gone. When selecting the next need/luxury that u want to start making, take a look at the residents overlay and hover ur mouse over the needs/luxuries. There u will see how many coins or workforce u will gain by delivering the new product. If u are Short on workforce maybe start producing an item that gives u that. Sometimes it #8217;s just a building that will give u workforce so just place it down and u should be good ;) Hope the these Tipps help!
I don #8217;t have 500 engineers on bright sands yet but on uplay it shows me 100% but no achievement for completing the campaign yet #129335; #127996; #8205; #9794; #65039;

I ain #8217;t that high in Elo, am not best in solo carrying. But what I #8217;ve heard from some Video and kind of works pretty good is to skill 2 in w to wave clear the casters with 2 w #8216;s. Then skill q up max. This works well against melee champions because u get good counter damage when they jump on u or walk into melee range.

Don #8217;t overproduce and build enough houses. Specifically for anno 1800: U don #8217;t need to produce on each island, in the beginning producing on ur main island is enough (so u might only need farmers on ur second island) Have fun, not too hard at the start cause it #8217;s a slow paced game, but be careful if u have strong AI opponents: as soon as they start a war with u and ur not prepared they will fuck u up, since it #8217;s a slow paced game u can #8217;t build defenses fast / military ships. If u manage to get enough money, u can always pay for cease fire with the pirates, this helps a ton (for me atleast, no more worrying about enemy ships destroying ur own)

My real question would be how many bought it on the epic store. If they sold a lot of copies, epic might do it a gain in the future.. For steam there are people who bought it pre release and people who will wait for it to come again. It #8217;s not too many I think, the majority of people don #8217;t really care about the game hoster or read news online.

Either you could build more production, or try to get to t4 citizen. Every citizen only has needs/luxuries from the tier before. So the t4 citizens wont need sausages anymore. And your t3 citizens don #8217;t need cloths anymore. So either upgrade your citizen or make up your production. As soon as you have a steady production and your not overproducing your balance should be good and you should gain money. If your not getting money then, try to get more luxuries, these give loads of cash

They do have the rights, but epic is offering better shares of the sold copies and also money to be exclusives, which feels kind of bad as a gamer/consumer.(there #8217;s loads of discussion on this just google it). The games great, as an old anno fan it feels fresh but still on its roots. There #8217;s enough complexity to keep u going for a long time. The main problem atm is bugs. There #8217;s quite a lot of them and it sometimes doesn #8217;t feel good at all. (I haven experienced game breaking ones though) There #8217;s also some annoying things like bad ship movement/naval combat. Furthermore are the shear amounts of unorganisches trading routes and ships in the later stages. Don #8217;t get me wrong it #8217;s a great game, but not perfect yet ;) they will fix a lot (atleast that #8217;s what they are saying), I don #8217;t think they will let us down. All of the previews games turned out great (apart from 2205, that game was too far from the routes to be able to be called an anno game, still good on its own )

Having goods in ur warehouse that don #8217;t get used is like buying a burger and only eating half of it, u throw the other half away.( that doesn #8217;t make sense xD) It #8217;s just wasted goods in ur warehouse. And i find selling items to npc inefficient cause u don #8217;t get much from it. I sold 300t of weapons (the first ones from worker class) to the lady in the new world and only got like 150k gold and 1t takes (without electricity etc) 90secs to produce. So it took 450mins to produce all that for only 150k? (Maybe my calculation is wrong but I think u get the point) I always try to perfect it by slowing building more production chains and observing if it #8217;s enough or not. I only do this with the more complicated ones. I usually build a few in blueprints in advance, so it #8217;s easier to just produce more. I like expanding so I know I #8217;ll need the extra farms in blue print at some point

Yes u need houses on every island. But to just make farms work u only need farmers, for who u can easily produce the needs on every single island with a fishery and clothing chain. So basically u need a small town on each island. If u unlock t4 engineers u can build a commuter pier. When u build that on an island all workforce are combined and useable where eventually have an active commuter pier. With this I can change ur production buildings to a different island.
Depends on if unsanft Tor in ur farms on +50% work condition they might not like it. But yes usually u don #8217;t need it, but it #8217;s not that hard to do so why not the extra income?:)
I will definitely try this and report back. Nice setup btw :)

WRITING.TITLE: Update 2: Performance Boost?
WRITING.TEXT: Hey, didn #8217;t have much time to play with the latest update, but I played for around 40mins and since the update my performance in this game increased from around 30-40fps in dense area with lots of buildings to 60-70fps (did not change anything in the setting.. and im even imagining that it looks better (probably cause it #8217;s less laggy)). Also my streets are full of people, quite a lot more than usual, I know there #8217;s a setting for it but like I said I didn #8217;t touch the settings at all. Has anybody else noticed anything similar?

Since ship of the line are still very cheap to make and have more raw damage, when taking over the npcs main island I build a lot of them so I don #8217;t worry about them not sinking, since I don #8217;t care about them sinking. But if u upgrade ur battle cruisers with items I assume they are quite strong now. But since I have never bothered making advanced weapons (70hrs into the game xD only bought some cruisers) I can #8217;t tell ya mich about them, I only have a kill squad that can move around freely

I am back on it and checking settings.. these have somehow changed and direct x12 has been enabled(used to crash for me) could this give a significant performance boost? Edit: nevermind that it just crashed again

Cities skylines is a totally different game, it has a very different approach to building a city. I could go into very detail, but i think its best for u to just try it out. Im am Anno veteran, played it since Anno 1602 and am in love with it, it has a unique playstyle to it, Getting the needs up to upgrade ur citizen and make them happy. Building ships, making trade routes and getting the productions right is fundamental here City skylines has a strong focus on traffic managing, making 1 big city with different districts for different needs for the city/houses. Theres no enemy u have to fight and units to control, u build different types of roads and have to manage ur traffic in and out of the city. You can build beautiful cities here aswell without money problems if you want. So this is a city simulation game. Id say try city skylines aswell, especially with mods, I #8217;ve put hundreds of hours into as well because i like building my own little (or big) city with different districts.

The nightclub uses up to 5 businesses to make its own product which u can sell. So if u have 5 other businesses it #8217;s most profitable (there are differences which businesses aswell, but it #8217;s not worth the big investment with only 1 other business)

Orianna is a Control Support mage. With her ball u can often Zone people out if they know u have ultimate up. U can even zone during Laning Phase, so if they walk up for cs and touch ur ball u can q the ball on the enemy (w is very mana hungry and not always useful early). Maxing q and harassing/csing with q is ur best bet early. Mid/late game is all about groupin, splitpushing, objectives and picking the right fights. As orianna its great to have someone who can engage and cc a lot and u will want to group. Since ur a support control mage and not a 1 shot mage assassin. U are good if the fight takes longer and can support ur frontline/carry with ur damage/cc/shield. (If u are fed u will be able to 1 shot some aswell, but after ur ultimate u are a bit defenseless alone, because u have cds and the enemy will go hard in u, so don #8217;t take the frontline, unless u are baiting zonyas) Forcing the enemy to walk through ur ball is always good. So when picking fights and u place ur ball into a pathway so the enemy has to take a longer route or reposition/cut off someone, is always a good idea (not if uncut off the fed person who will Penta kill ur whole team, but u know what I mean ;)) A great tip is to, like someone already mentioned, is to be aggressive in lane and sometime use ultimate for someone to just have to recall. Most of the time u won #8217;t be able to 1 shot them but make them force back. After u cleared the most minions from a wave and enemy wants to xD and uses a damage spell to cs and ur a bit closer to ur tower this is a good idea to ultimate him(very good is to knock him back to ur tower for some extra space) and start Autoing him and q w him while he rubs back to his tower. Good idea is to poke him a bit before with a q w but sometimes it #8217;s also good to do an aggressive surprise ultimate when he is max health. Pay attention to ur items when I get power spikes, u will Noticably make more damage and can alsmost kill them. I usually only go with a corrupting pot. Especially for the sustain and mana Regen. But also to win early trades: with ur passive and extra auto damage u will be able to harass him insanely well if u can hit him a lot (just take care of the enemy minions who aggro u) I am stuck in high gold atm, but i tend to find myself playing like a mid/high plat. I love teamcomps/fighting like a team and in this elo it #8217;s a bit hard.. in my elo is, if I play ori, always take barrier. The enemy will usually Always forget that u have it. And u get pushed in and enemy kungele comes and they want to dive u, and that #8217;s a huge mistake cause of ur cc, shield and barrier. That #8217;s how I normally get the lead. And don #8217;t forget u scale very good and will be almost 1 shotting squishies late game with a qw combo. So even if behind try to get ur good zoning and ultis out and protect the one who does most damage. Orianna has the potential to stall out a game with ur wave clear and zoning/supporting. Orianna is a Great Champ, Love her the Most. She #8217;s usually a safe pick, has no hard counters and fits in almost all teamcomps. My last tip: google probuilds Orianna. There u will get a good idea of what to build in some match ups and what runes to take. Cheers #129346;
It should still be the per residence, cause that #8217;s how its calculated and they can #8217;t just change it. But I could be wrong.

WRITING.TITLE: Lego Welt [Vanilla]{Snapshots}{Whitelist}{SMP}{Anarchy}
WRITING.TEXT: My friend and I are looking for some people to play a survival world with the latest snapshots together. We usually build big things together, go on adventures, fight ourselves through things, figure out how to make a redstone contraption (or just use YouTube :D ) and have a good time. We are in our mid twenties and from Germany, but anybody who #8217;s relaxed and wants to have fun together is welcome. You can mind your own business, build somewhere else if you want, nothings strict here. just to have someone to talk to while building alone/together makes it more fun. Not being alone in your own survival world is far better! It #8217;s also fun to see a new structure that has been built and which hasnt been there before, when you #8216;ve not been online for a bit #128579; We don #8217;t want any griefers or anything, you can have your own tools and items etc. and you can bring along a friend and build your own base together. we #8217;ve started a vanilla server (it #8217;s originally a single player world that I started alone and now my friend has joined and we opened up a server, so he is just starting out aswell! we are trying out a few vanilla tweaks, like multiplayer sleep, so only 1 person has to be in bed to sleep. we have also put up a death counter so we know how often someone dies... just for the fun of it :-) if your interested just leave a comment below and we can get in touch! Basic human rules like being respectful, not destroying the world, griefing, etc. should be followed. If we ever get a small community up we can make a more formal approach to applications, basic rules etc. But for now this is just a very laid back, fun server with a few people to enjoy surviving, building, exploring together or to just enjoy the company of someone in a virtual world :) Server IP: 62.104.73.15

WRITING.TITLE: LegoWelt [Vanilla]{SMP}{Whitelist}{Snapshot}
WRITING.TEXT: This is a small vanilla server with a few vanilla tweaks (none are final, we are just testing them out). We are a small group of friends from Germany in our mid 20s who have been enjoying Minecraft since our school years. We have always been keen on playing together and having fun in this virtual world. At this point in time, we have figured out, sharing this great experience with more people is even better, especially because not all of our school friends play Minecraft anymore. Living in a world not only by ourselves is a lot more enjoyable and fun! Seeing buildings grow and other things being built from other people is just a great feeling and gives so much joy. There are no set rules on where you have to be on the server, it would be cool if we are all closer together so we can see each other from time to time or build bigger projects together. We can always connect each other through the nether You have total freedom of everything as long as you respect the few rules so everyone can have the best possible vanilla experience. Features: - This is a vanilla server and there are no mods installed. - We try to use the latest snapshots, since we love testing out the new features from mojang. - We do everything in survival, no creative or other game modes. - There will be no commands for items/levels/spawning etc. Literally the scoreboard command will be used, because we like to see how often someone dies when pressing tab We are testing out some data packs(my first time ever), just to tweak the experience a tiny bit. These are not final and might be changed in the future, depending on what the majority thinks is too much or needs to be added. - Mob Heads have a chance of dropping on a kill (Reason: Fun) - Player Heads will drop if killed by a player (Reason: Fun) - The Enderdragon will drop an elytra (Reason: this helps the long marches through the end when it #8217;s been raided for thousands of blocks already) - Shulkers drop 2 shells each (Reason: Same as above, but this might be too much) - XYZ and Time Display (Reason: Ability to show only the Coordinates and Direction instead of the whole F3 screen, which is overwhelmed by information and text) - AFK Display (Reason: To see if someone is afk and not active) Multiplayer Sleep (Reason: Only 1 person needs to sleep, like in Singleplayer) If you are interested just join our discord server: https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7 or leave a comment below to get in touch! IP: LegoWelt.serverminer.com

There are some nice answers here already. But I #8217;ll add a few words. Like already mentioned the most important part is to #8222;Just take your time #8220; the game is very complex at first or even later. As a SP managing multiple worlds is very hard, the Coop Mode is very beneficial here, but it still works in SP. What you have to to is stabilize your islands. I #8217;m not sure if you have found the statistic screen yet, but you can see how many tonnes per minute an island uses (either uses in production or consumes from the residences) If everything is in the green (not really green, just positive) your island is set and can be left alone for most of the time. There are currently 4 maps and by the end of this year with season pass 2 #8216;s final DLC we will get a 5th map with new residences and needs. To know about the maps: 2 of the maps are from the standard game and are necessary to get all investors. CAPE Trelawny only has a huge island and some good items but has nothing new to it, so this could be left alone if you don #8217;t want that huge island. The Arctic introduces air ships which are neat for end game trading routes (although in tonnes per min it #8217;s not the fastest cause it only has 4 slots) and some alternative things like better gold mines and a different fuel source for electricity. It adds its own residences but it is NOT needed for your old world residences. So if you are struggling with managing multiple worlds, keep it slow, make sure your islands are some what safe to leave alone for a while. If you have a NUM Pad your can use numbers 1-4 to cycle through your worlds with ease (or bind it in the options to something else)

What I struggle with, even after hundreds of hours of gameplay is the long travel distance between the old and new world for production (for example Rum or cotton delivery). Make sure you have enough ships assigned to that route. My Tipp here is that in the route management you can set a few rules to the ships, for example to wait until it is fully loaded/unloaded before taking off to the next destination. I usually make enough piers on a rum island and make the ships wait until they are fully loaded to make most out of the travel distance, not sure if this is the best way but it seems to work out for me) Glad I could help you out :)
U habe to manage ur influence. Either expand in economy, culture or war. I bet u have some some spent influence that are no use for u on some of ur islands.

WRITING.TITLE: LegoWelt[Vanilla]{SMP}{Whitelist}{1.15.2}
WRITING.TEXT: This is a small vanilla server with a few vanilla tweaks (none are final, we are just testing them out). We are a small group of friends from Germany in our mid 20s who have been enjoying Minecraft since our school years. We have always been keen on playing together and having fun in this virtual world. At this point in time, we have figured out, sharing this great experience with more people is even better, especially because not all of our school friends play Minecraft anymore. Living in a world not only by ourselves is a lot more enjoyable and fun! Seeing buildings grow and other things being built from other people is just a great feeling and gives so much joy. There are no set rules on where you have to be on the server, it would be cool if we are all closer together so we can see each other from time to time or build bigger projects together. We can always connect each other through the nether You have total freedom of everything as long as you respect the few rules that are stated on our discord server, like the use of common sense when doing something that could hurt someone else #8217;s feelings or builds. Play on the server so everyone can have the best possible vanilla experience. We have grown into a small european community with people from all over Europe atm. We wanted to play snapshots at first but we had some issues with the Snapshots, therefore we created a new World with a new host in the 1.15.2 Version and will update as soon as 1.16 is out. Features: This is a vanilla server and there are no mods installed. We will upgrade to 1.16 once it is out. Refresh Nether aswell. We do everything in survival, no creative or other game modes. There will be no commands for items/levels/spawning etc. Literally the scoreboard command will be used, because we like to see how often someone dies when pressing tab We are testing out some data packs(my first time ever), just to tweak the experience a tiny bit. These are not final and might be changed in the future, depending on what the majority thinks is too much or needs to be added. Mob Heads have a chance of dropping on a kill (Reason: Fun) Player Heads will drop if killed by a player (Reason: Fun) The Enderdragon will drop an elytra (Reason: this helps the long marches through the end when it #8217;s been raided for thousands of blocks already) Shulkers drop 2 shells each (Reason: Same as above, but this might be too much) XYZ and Time Display (Reason: Ability to show only the Coordinates and Direction instead of the whole F3 screen, which is overwhelmed by information and text) AFK Display (Reason: To see if someone is afk and not active) Multiplayer Sleep (Reason: Only 1 person needs to sleep, like in Singleplayer) If you are interested just join our discord server: [https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7](https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7) or leave a comment below to get in touch! Update: For now we are only accepting peeps from around Europe Time Zone. This ensures that ppl will get to see each other more often. This is important for a small server like this.

WRITING.TITLE: Anno 1800 Update 8 - New soundtrack?
WRITING.TEXT: Is it just me or do we have new soundtrack? I can't find anything about it anywhere when I google it. I am actually even more in love with these (new) tracks! :) I even turned down game sound and put music up pretty loud, but when fire breaks out I freak out cause of the high volume :D

i only found this: " We have fixed an issue that could lead to the game #8217;s soundtrack being repetitive, so enjoy a wider selection of songs during your industrial adventures. " But I am hearing tracks that I've never heard before, that's what got me wondering. And I have over 150 hours of ingame time.
I think the technology is more late 1800s early 1900s, that #8217;s what he might of ment

WRITING.TITLE: Fastest possible Production in a building?
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;ve been wondering if there is a fastest possible production? Especially for Oil Refineries. If the processing time says every second it produces, can it go any faster? Is it a waste of items to try to get it faster?
Yea, but if the processing time says 1 sec, is there a difference if it you add more %? Cause it never goes higher than 1 sec processing time.
Did you build the farm or is it only a blueprint? Blue prints don #8217;t work. Might also be a bug, currently update 8 has a quite a few small bugs and the are working on a patch

The game encourages u to expand and build big cities. Try to build lots of houses to get a better income. And luxury goods are also a good way to gain more money. In statistic screen u can see how much u are producing per minute and how much ur people are consuming.

I second that. Every time I start a new game I think to myself: I want a challenge and not just build in an empty world. But then the lvl 3 difficulty guys are constantly in war with me and annoy me cause they don #8217;t wanna peace with me even though I could wipe them off the waters in a finger snip. Then I am forced to fight them and can #8217;t build and expand on my city, which I actually enjoy a lot more since the ship fights are not the best in a game like this and mostly it #8217;s the more fire power wins (spamming ship of the lines wins any island over, at least vs AI) For the resource difficulty etc I usually put everything in medium and the island difficulty easy, since I like to build big cities and I need the space. If u want a little challenge at the beginning got for low income, it gets irrelevant cause at some point ull have millions (If u know what ur doing). Pirates are always on hard. If u can #8217;t deal with them u can pay off a peace treaty, usually not too expensive, at any point. Trading with them is insane. You can sell 1t of rum for 2000 coins each. So one full steam cargo nets u I believe half a million (I #8217;m a bit tired atm :D) A tip: to buy steam ships u can just buy them off the NPC. They are not too expensive and I don #8217;t best steel beams nor those mashines(forgot the name). Hope this helps.
Ah so for the AI I #8217;d suggest lvl2 difficulty and anarchist if u enjoy him and to get all the content into 1 big endless game.

Do u mean the Anarchist? The anarchist is a dlc which has some items (that u can buy from his Harbour), quests and newspaper options (which I personally don #8217;t use for my type of playing) that are only available if u have the anarchist NPC in ur session. I typically like to play very long sessions conquering the whole world and building mega cities, that #8217;s why I usually have him in the game so I can have all the content that anno offers in one session so I don #8217;t have to start a new one. For the NPCs: lvl 2 NPCs are usually peaceful in my sessions, the lvl 3 NPCs always start war cause one of them likes and the other one doesn #8217;t like me using the newspaper.. but maybe I #8217;m just not good at having good relationships :D

WRITING.TEXT: This is a small vanilla server with a few vanilla tweaks. We started out as a small group of friends from Germany. We are in our mid 20s and have been enjoying Minecraft since our school years. We have always been keen on playing together and having fun in this virtual world. At this point in time, we have figured out, sharing this great experience with more people is even better, especially because not all of our school friends play Minecraft anymore. Living in a world not only by ourselves is a lot more enjoyable and fun! Seeing buildings grow and other things being built from other people is just a great feeling and gives so much joy. There are no set rules on where you have to be on the server, it would be cool if we are all closer together so we can see each other from time to time or build bigger projects together. We can always connect each other through the nether You have total freedom of everything as long as you respect the few rules that are stated on our discord server, like the use of common sense when doing something that could hurt someone else #8217;s feelings or builds. Play on the server so everyone can have the best possible vanilla experience. We have grown into a small european community with people from all over Europe atm. We have updated our 1.15.2 world to 1.16 and many of us have been waiting for it. We welcome all new members. The nether has been reset! Features: This is a vanilla server and there are no mods installed. Nether has been refreshed for 1.16. We do everything in survival, no creative or other game modes. There will be no commands for items/levels/spawning etc. Literally the scoreboard command will be used, because we like to see how often someone dies when pressing tab We are testing out some data packs(my first time ever), just to tweak the experience a tiny bit. Some Color changes to names have been made to identify someone who knows their way around the world will also be present. These are not final and might be changed in the future, depending on what the majority thinks is too much or needs to be added. If you are interested just join our discord server: [https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7](https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7) or leave a comment below to get in touch!

We have 2 Seasons. Season 1: Botanica(Just more Cultural Stuff: Very similar to Museums and Zoos) Sunken Treasures (New Play Session with the biggest island to build a huge city which is kind of nice, but for me it always makes myself only build my big city on that island, but still a great dlc) The Passage (New Play Session with new Residents and an alternative Energy and Airships for Trading that fly over land) Season 2: Seat of Power (Adds a powerful modular Building to one of your Islands with your main residences and adds many statistical buffs that improve micromanagement by a lot! But is mainly for end game and people who know what they are doing to make stuff efficient) Bright Harvest (Adds grain Silos to Boost Animal Farms by 100% efficiency and adds Tractorbarn that use oil for Crop Farms to add 200%. This DLC is mainly to make less Farms but more efficient and bigger ones. Good to use with trading halls. Land of Lion (Not released yet but seems to be one of the biggest add ones with new residences and playsession and all) Each Season DLC is obtainable separately or together in bundles 1 and 2. if ur really into it I #8217;d recommend getting both Seasons for the ultimate gameplay. There is a lot to explore and each DLC adds another thing to consider while building and expanding. If ur not getting all DLCs then I #8217;d atleast recommend all the new game sessions. The least important DLC imo is Botanica. Anarchist is a new Charakter NPC to have in ur session, obtainable with the deluxe edition. The interesting part is the new items that he introduced into the game, but I only buy 2-4 different items from him that I use. Don #8217;t know if that #8217;s really worth it. He is also only playable as a 2 star difficulty that cant be changed. I hope this helps :) I have both season passes and anarchist and I #8217;m really happy with al the additions.

Either like already mentioned the silos are not unlocked cause I didn #8217;t select it during start. Or what I think is that u have it unlocked. U have to select the silo inside the farm building, like u would select to build the fields. And u can only build them when uve built the building, blueprints don #8217;t work. (I find that rather annoying)
There #8217;s 2 different seasons with 3 dlcs last year for season 1 and 3 this year

Play on the server so everyone can have the best possible vanilla experience. We have grown into a small european community with people from all over Europe atm. We have refreshed the world for 1.16. We are planing on raiding the 1st dragon together as a group. We welcome all new trustworthy members. Features: This is a vanilla server and there are no mods installed. Nether has been refreshed for 1.16. We do everything in survival, no creative or other game modes. There will be no commands for items/levels/spawning etc. Literally the scoreboard command will be used, because we like to see how often someone dies when pressing tab We are testing out some data packs(my first time ever), just to tweak the experience a tiny bit. Some Color changes to names have been made to identify someone who knows their way around the world will also be present.These are not final and might be changed in the future, depending on what the majority thinks is too much or needs to be added. Mob Heads have a chance of dropping on a kill (Reason: Fun) Player Heads will drop if killed by a player (Reason: Fun) The Enderdragon will drop an elytra (Reason: this helps the long marches through the end when it #8217;s been raided for thousands of blocks already) Shulkers drop 2 shells each (Reason: Same as above, but this might be too much) XYZ and Time Display (Reason: Ability to show only the Coordinates and Direction instead of the whole F3 screen, which is overwhelmed by information and text) AFK Display (Reason: To see if someone is afk and not active) Multiplayer Sleep (Reason: Only 1 person needs to sleep, like in Singleplayer) We are currently looking for people around Europe Timezone. Since this is a small server it #8217;s beneficial to have people online at around the das time. If you are interested just join our discord server: [https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7](https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7)

WRITING.TITLE: LegoWelt[Vanilla]{SMP}{Whitelist}{1.16.1}
WRITING.TEXT: This is a small vanilla server with a few vanilla tweaks. We started out as a small group of friends from Germany. We are in our mid 20s and have been enjoying Minecraft since our school years. We have always been keen on playing together and having fun in this virtual world. At this point in time, we have figured out, sharing this great experience with more people is even better, especially because not all of our school friends play Minecraft anymore. Living in a world not only by ourselves is a lot more enjoyable and fun! Seeing buildings grow and other things being built from other people is just a great feeling and gives so much joy. There are no set rules on where you have to be on the server, it would be cool if we are all closer together so we can see each other from time to time or build bigger projects together. We can always connect each other through the nether You have total freedom of everything as long as you respect the few rules that are stated on our discord server, like the use of common sense when doing something that could hurt someone else #8217;s feelings or builds. Play on the server so everyone can have the best possible vanilla experience and respect the spawn area, this is a community area. We have grown into a small european community with people from all over Europe atm. We have refreshed the world for 1.16. We welcome all new trustworthy members. We all have our own jobs and real life, but being active every now and then would be nice. Especially participation in community builds and events helps grow this community closer together! You can host your own events or build your big project ideas too. Features: This is a vanilla server and there are no mods installed. We are running on papermc with a few little tweaks that visually don #8217;t change the vanilla gameplay but improve the multiplayer smoothness by a lot. Paper also helps me figure out lag issues a lot better, if there are any. We do everything in survival, no creative or other game modes. There will be no commands for items/levels/spawning etc. Literally the scoreboard command will be used, because we like to see how often someone dies when pressing tab. (This might changed once the arena and pvp tournaments are held #128556;) We are testing out some data pack just to tweak vanilla experience a tiny bit. These are not final and might be changed in the future, depending on what the majority thinks is too much or needs to be added. Following Data packs are currently installed: Mob Heads have a chance of dropping on a kill (Reason: Fun) Player Heads will drop if killed by a player (Reason: Fun) The Enderdragon will drop an elytra (Reason: this helps the long marches through the end when it #8217;s been raided for thousands of blocks already) Shulkers drop 2 shells each (Reason: Same as above) XYZ and Time Display (Reason: Ability to show only the Coordinates and Direction instead of the whole F3 screen, which is overwhelmed by information and text) AFK Display (Reason: To see if someone is afk and not active) Multiplayer Sleep (Reason: Only 50% of the people online have to sleep to skip the night. We have changed this from 1 player sleep this week and it seems to be better this way) As with every decision, I as a server owner will ask my fellow members and debate on new data packs or community projects. I #8217;d love for you to help me out with new community projects and ideas! This is not just about my ideas, we are all working in this world together! (At least in the Community area, your bases and farms are all private property #128076; #127995;) We are currently looking for people around Europe Timezone. Since this is a small server it #8217;s beneficial to have people online at around the same time. If you are interested come join our discord server and introduce yourself to us: [https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7](https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7) See you soon! TeCK

WRITING.TITLE: LegoWelt[Vanilla]{SMP}{Whitelist}{1.16.3}
WRITING.TEXT: This is a small vanilla server with a few vanilla tweaks. We started out as a small group of friends from Germany. We are in our mid 20s and have been enjoying Minecraft since our school years. We have always been keen on playing together and having fun in this virtual world. At this point in time, we have figured out, sharing this great experience with more people is even better, especially because not all of our school friends play Minecraft anymore. Living in a world not only by ourselves is a lot more enjoyable and fun! Seeing buildings grow and other things being built from other people is just a great feeling and gives so much joy. There are no set rules on where you have to be on the server, it would be cool if we are all closer together so we can see each other from time to time or build bigger projects together. We can always connect each other through the nether You have total freedom of everything as long as you respect the few rules that are stated on our discord server, like the use of common sense when doing something that could hurt someone else #8217;s feelings or builds. Play on the server so everyone can have the best possible vanilla experience and respect the spawn area, this is a community area. We have grown into a small european community with people from all over Europe atm. We have refreshed the world for 1.16. We welcome all new trustworthy members. We all have our own jobs and real life, but being active every now and then would be nice. Especially participation in community builds and events helps grow this community closer together! You can host your own events or build your big project ideas too. Features: This is a vanilla server and there are no mods installed. We are running on papermc with a few little tweaks that visually don #8217;t change the vanilla gameplay but improve the multiplayer smoothness by a lot. Paper also helps me figure out lag issues a lot better, if there are any. We do everything in survival, no creative or other game modes. There will be no commands for items/levels/spawning etc. Literally the scoreboard command will be used, because we like to see how often someone dies when pressing tab. (This might changed once the arena and pvp tournaments are held #128556;) We are testing out some data pack just to tweak vanilla experience a tiny bit. These are not final and might be changed in the future, depending on what the majority thinks is too much or needs to be added. Following Data packs are currently installed: Mob Heads have a chance of dropping on a kill (Reason: Fun) Player Heads will drop if killed by a player (Reason: Fun) The Enderdragon will drop an elytra (Reason: this helps the long marches through the end when it #8217;s been raided for thousands of blocks already) Shulkers drop 2 shells each (Reason: Same as above) XYZ and Time Display (Reason: Ability to show only the Coordinates and Direction instead of the whole F3 screen, which is overwhelmed by information and text) AFK Display (Reason: To see if someone is afk and not active) Multiplayer Sleep (Reason: Only 50% of the people online have to sleep to skip the night. We have changed this from 1 player sleep this week and it seems to be better this way) As with every decision, I as a server owner will ask my fellow members and debate on new data packs or community projects. I #8217;d love for you to help me out with new community projects and ideas! This is not just about my ideas, we are all working in this world together! (At least in the Community area, your bases and farms are all private property #128076; #127995;) We are currently looking for people around Europe Timezone. Since this is a small server it #8217;s beneficial to have people online at around the same time. If you are interested come join our discord server and introduce yourself to us: [https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7](https://discord.gg/ysNpqW7) See you soon! TeCK
